teal.ui.control.meters

Class ControlCanvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • teal.ui.UIPanel
              • teal.ui.control.meters.ControlCanvas
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, HasID, TElement, THasPropertyChange, ControlConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ControlAnimatedCanvas

    public abstract class ControlCanvas
extends UIPanel
implements ControlConstants
    It is an abstract class. The subclass must implement the propertyChange and setValue method.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
